mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pwd, name, gender, birthday, phone, enterdate, deptno, teamnum, jobnum) values(#{id},#{pwd},#{name},#{gender},#{birthday},#{phone},#{enterdate},#{deptno},#{teamnum},#{jobnum})
mapper.select: select id from member where id=#{id} AND pwd=#{pwd}
select id, pwd, name, gender, birthday, phone, enterdate, deptno, teamnum, jobnum from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd}, phone=#{phone}, deptno=#{deptno}, teamnum=#{teamnum}, jobnum=#{jobnum} where id=#{id}
